audioJson.name: SD
audioJson.size:
Standard: 3.2 x 2.4 x 0.2 cm
Mini: 2.15 x 2 x 0.2 cm
Micro: 1.1 x 1.5 x 0.2 cm
audioJson.fact1: This format was typically used for downloaded digital files, but a couple dozen albums were officially released on these cards
audioJson.fact2: This format comes in different classes, denoting writing speed: C (Speed Class), U (UHS Speed Class), V (Video Speed Class), and Application Performance Class
audioJson.fact3: There are four non-compatible SD card types: SD, SDHC (High Capacity), SDXC (eXtended Capacity), and SDUC (Ultra Capacity)
